constituent: mediator, woman, so-and-so, sweet, wicker basket, picnic basket, tree, wood
koohiiStory1: The woman 女 hoped her friend would act as mediator to set her up with the guy she liked. She didn't mention his name, just referred to him as "A certain unnamed person -- I'll call him 'Mr. So-and-So 某' ...."
koohiiStory2: The two little gossiping girls with their lollipops are having a fight. Now an adult woman (mom or teacher) has to come between them an serve as a mediator.
